about_the_game:
Dead War is a thrilling third-person shooter (TPS) that immerses players in intense, action-packed battles. With dynamic gameplay and tactical combat, you’ll face relentless opponents in varied environments, challenging your skill and strategy in real time.

With realistic 3D graphics and an intuitive control system, Dead War offers an immersive, high-quality experience, ideal for shooter fans looking for an adrenaline rush and constant challenge. Fast-paced action and strategic decisions are key to survival, making each encounter unique.

The game features a diverse selection of scenarios, each with its own advantages and obstacles, requiring quick thinking and adaptation. Dead War offers two main game modes: Control Point, for those looking for competition to achieve victory, and Elimination, for those who prefer team action and the team that eliminates the most wins.

Whether you’re a strategist or a sharpshooter, Dead War offers opportunities for everyone to excel. Get ready to jump into the action and prove who’s the best!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOs 13
  • Processor: Intel Core
  • Memory: 5 GB RAM

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows (64-bit) 10
  • Processor: i3 10100F / RYZEN 5 3600X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 / AMD R9 270X
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows (64-bit) 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 6700 or AMD Ryzen 7 2700X
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 or AMD Radeon RX 5600 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
